## als_env:  

### SV 112 Emerson Place

** NOT CORRECT REPORT FOR THIS ADDRESS 

```{r}
#First Sample
als_1 = read_excel("data/data_from_M/als_env/SV 112 Emerson Place.xlsx", 
                        range = "A69:L132", col_names = FALSE) %>% 
  rename("Parameter" = ...1,
         "Results" = ...6, 
         "Units" = ...10,
         "LOQ" = ...12) %>% 
  select(c(Parameter, Results, Units, LOQ)) %>% 
  mutate(Matrix = "Air", 
         Lab = "ALS Environmental",
         Street = "112 Emerson Place",
         Client_ID = "SG1",
         Collection_date = "07/26/2011", 
         Analysis_date = "08/03/2011",
         Project_ID = "12CBCP029K")
```
